subject: RE: [junit] ClassNotFoundException
msgSnippet: That class was probably not loaded in by your class loader.
messageBody:
That class was probably not loaded in by your class loader.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: messy_head_2001@... [mailto:messy_head_2001@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 22, 2001 9:47 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] ClassNotFoundException
>
>
> I am trying to use JUnit to test a method which calls
>
> Class.forName("myClassName")
>
> however I get a ClassNotFoundException from this line of
> code, which
> works perfectly when not using JUnit.
>
> Any ideas??
>
> David.
